feed_info.name: Funny Quotes
feed_info.description: A collection of quotes that elicit laughs, or at least try to

quotes.body: I intend to live forever. So far, so good
I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work
I'm not a vegetarian because I love animals. I'm a vegetarian because I hate plants
I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens
I have a photographic memory, but I always forget to bring the film
I used to be indecisive, but now I'm not sure
I'm not arguing. I'm just explaining why I'm right
I'm not lazy, I'm just conserving energy
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised
I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by
I'm not great at the advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific
I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious
I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member
I have a memory like an elephant. In fact, elephants often consult me
I have a simple philosophy: Fill what's empty. Empty what's full. Scratch where it itches
My therapist told me the way to achieve true inner peace is to finish what I start. So far I've finished two bags of M&Ms and a chocolate cake. I feel better already
I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything
The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese
I don't want to brag, but I do speak pig latin; I mean, I'm not fluent, but I'm sure if I ever went there, I could get by
My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them
